title: Bitcoin Breaks $28K for the First Time Since May
description: News of BlackRock's upcoming Bitcoin ETF filing sparked optimism in an otherwise battered and bruised crypto market.

title: NFT card game Z-ERA hacked for $285k; native coin loses virtually all value
description:
A non-fungible token (NFT) based card game called Z-ERA has been exploited for $285,000, blockchain security firm CertiK reported on June 20. CertiK said it discovered an exploit against Z-ERA’s BNB Smart Chain address in which an externally-owned account (EOA) deployed an unverified contract to steal funds. The attacking address managed to obtain 1.8 million […]

The post NFT card game Z-ERA hacked for $285k; native coin loses virtually all value appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Japanâ€™s crypto exchanges call for relaxed margin trading restrictions to boost market growth
description: Japan’s cryptocurrency exchanges are urging regulators to relax margin trading restrictions on popular cryptocurrencies, such as bitcoin (BTC), to stimulate market growth and attract new participants, according to a report by Bloomberg. However, the Japan Virtual and Crypto Assets Exchange Association (JVCEA), a self-regulated body of local exchanges, has proposed increasing leverage limits for retail ... Read more
